field.name: summary
field.value: ARDataBinding and joined subclasses with derived BelongsTo, HasMany, HasAndBelongsToMany proeprties

field.name: description
field.value:
1. ARDataBind does not bind HasMany or HasAndBelongsToMany properties in joined subclass, that are derived from the base class. 2. Binding BelongsTo proeprty, that is derived from the base class, proeprty instance is not reinstantiated and generates an error upon Flush.
Supplied patch uses all hierarchy object's AR models recursively, to check whether the property to be bound is one of BelongsTo, HasMany or HasAndBelongsToMany properties.
